thig6.6:0.3: Verses of the Elder Mahāpajāpati Gotamī
thig6.6:1.1: "Homage to you, oh Buddha, oh hero,
thig6.6:2.2: craving, its cause, has been made to wither,
thig6.6:3.1: Before I was a mother, child, father, brother,
thig6.6:3.3: Not knowing the truth of how things are,
thig6.6:3.4: I came back again and again, not finding what I was looking for.
thig6.6:4.1: I have seen the Blessed One,
thig6.6:4.2: indeed this is my last body.
thig6.6:4.4: there is no coming back to any state of being."
thig6.6:5.4: this is paying homage to the Buddhas!
thig6.6:6.1: For the benefit of many beings,
